tools: React (w/ hooks and context API), Sass, ES5/6, Serverless, Node.js/Express.
detailsSubtitle: You can click the buttons below to view some screenshots of the site, as well as get more details on the project. Or you can visit the site itself by clicking here:
detailsTask: Create a crypto currency dashboard as a way to practice my skillset.
detailsChallenges: To make the dashboard look the same as the Dribbble shot without actual mocks. To build my own tiny backend service.
detailsResults: A good fullstack project for React and Express, using the Serverless framework.
detailsComments: I simply found a nice looking shot on Dribbble and decided to build out some of it. So far this has quite limited functionality, but the price data is accurate (from https://www.coinapi.io/). There are no shots for any of the the other views, so I'm not sure I'll add those. Nor was there a mobile shot, so I just flexbox the whole site. Serverless rocks. I decided to put the CoinAPI I am using here behind my own little backend service just for practice.
